segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes, completely focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to notice the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the children behind her, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, reaching up to the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad, remembering how kids often go unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, her eyes full of hope.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is missing out on a precious moment with her children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene feels a bit melancholic, like a missed opportunity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she realizes how quickly they are growing up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bittersweet reminder of how life passes us by.
segments.speaker: PAR
